    • Method Detail

      • getCertificateEnrollment

        @GET(value="v3/certificate-enrollments/{certificate-enrollment-id}")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateEnrollment> getCertificateEnrollment(@Path(value="certificate-enrollment-id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String certificateEnrollmentId)
        Get a certificate enrollment by ID. Get a certificate enrollment by ID. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-enrollments/01612df56f3b0a580a010fc700000000 \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        certificateEnrollmentId - Certificate enrollment ID. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateEnrollment>

      • getCertificateEnrollments

        @GET(value="v3/certificate-enrollments")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateEnrollmentListResponse> getCertificateEnrollments(@Query(value="device_id__eq")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String deviceIdEq,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="certificate_name__eq")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String certificateNameEq,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String include,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="enroll_status__neq")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String enrollStatusNeq,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="enroll_status__eq")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String enrollStatusEq,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="enroll_result__neq")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String enrollResultNeq,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="enroll_result__eq")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String enrollResultEq,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="created_at__lte")
                                                                                                                      org.joda.time.DateTime createdAtLte,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="created_at__gte")
                                                                                                                      org.joda.time.DateTime createdAtGte,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="updated_at__lte")
                                                                                                                      org.joda.time.DateTime updatedAtLte,
                                                                                                                      @Query(value="updated_at__gte")
                                                                                                                      org.joda.time.DateTime updatedAtGte)
        Get certificate enrollments list. Get certificate enrollments list, optionally filtered. **Examples:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-enrollments \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ``` ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/certificate-enrollments?device_id__eq=01612df56f3b0a580a010fc700000000 \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        deviceIdEq - An optional filter for the device ID. (optional)
        certificateNameEq - An optional filter for a certificate. (optional)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). (optional)
        after - The ID of the item after which to retrieve the next page. (optional)
        order - The order of results. (optional)
        include - a comma-separated list of data fields to return. (optional)
        enrollStatusNeq - An optional filter for the non-equal certificate enrollment status. (optional)
        enrollStatusEq - An optional filter for the certificate enrollment status. (optional)
        enrollResultNeq - An optional filter for the non-equal certificate enrollment result. (optional)
        enrollResultEq - An optional filter for the certificate enrollment result. (optional)
        createdAtLte - An optional filter for the date-time, less than or equal, of the certificate enrollment requests creation. Must be in RFC3339 format (for example, 2018-01-30T10:03:50.106Z). (optional)
        createdAtGte - An optional filter for the date-time, greater than or equal, of the certificate enrollment requests creation. Must be in RFC3339 format (for example, 2018-01-30T10:03:50.106Z). (optional)
        updatedAtLte - An optional filter for the date-time, less than or equal, of the certificate enrollment requests update. Must be in RFC3339 format (for example, 2018-01-30T10:03:50.106Z). (optional)
        updatedAtGte - An optional filter for the date-time, greater than or equal, of the certificate enrollment requests update. Must be in RFC3339 format (for example, 2018-01-30T10:03:50.106Z). (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateEnrollmentListResponse>

      • requestCertificateRenewal

        @POST(value="v3/devices/{device-id}/certificates/{certificate-name}/renew")
retrofit2.Call<CertificateEnrollment> requestCertificateRenewal(@Path(value="device-id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String deviceId,
                                                                                                                                             @Path(value="certificate-name",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String certificateName)
        Request certificate renewal. Request a certificate renewal. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/devices/01612df56f3b0a580a010fc700000000/certificates/customer.dlms/renew \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-length: 0' ```
        Parameters:
        deviceId - The device ID. (required)
        certificateName - The certificate name. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<CertificateEnrollment>
